requirements: Prerequisite: one astronomy course numbered above 200, or permission of instructor.Â Previous experience with computer programming recommended.
description:
Optics for astronomers. Design and use of optical telescopes, photometers, spectrographs, and detectors for astronomical observations. Introduction to error analysis, concepts of signal-to-noise, and the reduction and analysis of photometric and spectroscopic observations.
Prerequisite: one astronomy course numbered above 200, or permission of instructor.Â Previous experience with computer programming recommended.
title: Observational Astronomy
